header.description: No header-level data required for this report.

rows.description: Each row represents a schema field definition from the app_schema_fields table with all metadata columns.

totals.description: No aggregate totals required for this report.

semantics: This report has no filter parameters. All schema fields are displayed without user-supplied filtering or date range constraints.
transformations: Load all rows from app_schema_fields table
Order results by schema_id ascending, then key ascending
